description:
In current scheduler design, when --availability-zone zone:host is given, all of the configured filters will be ignored, in some cases it will fail instance boot due to the mismatch of host architecture, although this is a admin action, we assume that the cloud admin should aware it well, but in some cases it might be get confused when somebody doesn't know it.

If we think this can be enhanced from robust perspective, we may solve it by honor the basic scheduler filters like imageproperties filter even the --availability-zone parameter being used, or we think this is work as design, at least we can update the admin doc to address it clearly.
title: The --availability-zone parameter will fail instance boot without honor imageproperties filter.
